## Problem 1
```{r}
pols_month_df = 
  read_csv("fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  separate_wider_delim(mon, "-", names = c("year","month","day")) |> 
  mutate(
    month = case_match(
    month,
    "01" ~ "jan",
    "02" ~ "feb",
    "03" ~ "mar",
    "04" ~ "apr",
    "05" ~ "may",
    "06" ~ "jun",
    "07" ~ "jul",
    "08" ~ "aug",
    "09" ~ "sep",
    "10" ~ "oct",
    "11" ~ "nov",
    "12" ~ "dec")) |> 
  mutate(president = case_when(
     prez_dem == 1 ~ "dem",
    prez_gop == 1 ~ "gop",
    prez_gop == 2 ~ "gop"
  )) |> select(-prez_dem, -prez_gop, -day)
```
